title: Create a Intl Prospect Player
custom_steps:
1. Locate Create New widget
2. Select International Amateur Player from dropdown
3. Fill out required fields and click Next 
4. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Create New widget is visible
2. Following fields are displayed:
- Country of Residence
- First Name
- Last Name
- Date of Birth
- National ID Country
- National ID Number
- Birth Country
- Birth Province
- Birth City
- Birth Sector
- Twin Count
- Not Subject to Draft checkbox
- Next Button
3. Fields work as expected and profile loads in edit mode 
4. Notification that profile is saved. Player appears on scout clipboard with a status of Preliminary

title: Submit Intl Profile to MLSB Admin for Approval
custom_steps:
1. Open preliminary International player entered from the scout clipboard 
2. Fill out all required fields
3. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. Profile opens in edit mode 
2. All fields should work appropriately
3. Profile is submitted to admin for review. International Player entered appears on the scout clipboard and the scouting admin clipboard with a status of Submitted 

*If 'Close' is clicked on Create Report prompt, Page reloads to dashboard*

title: Verify user is redirected to a blank report
custom_steps: 1. Click Yes to on create report prompt after you submitted the profile for review.
custom_expected:
1. User is redirected to a blank report for the player submitted. Report type should be International Prospect by default
2. Fields in the report should be populated:
-Birth date, Eligible Date, and Scouting Status (All from player profile)
-Date entered(the current date), Entered By (the scouts name), Report Status is Preliminary (user cannot edit)
-Position is populated from the player's profile

title: Approve a player submission
custom_steps:
1. Locate Scouting Admin Clipboard
2. Find International player entered submitted by MLSB scout 
3. Click on International Player entered 
4. Click approve
custom_expected:
1. Scouting Admin Clipboard should be visible
2. Player created previously should be present for Admin to Approve/Reject or Delete.
3. Player profile should be displayed in edit mode with Approve, Reject, Save, Delete, and Cancel buttons should be present.
4. Profile status is approved and profile loads to view mode. Item does NOT appear on scout clipboard or scouting admin clipboard.

title: Verify when New Trainer/Agent created details populated into Player profile page
custom_steps:
1. Click the New Trainer button in the section header
2. Complete all required fields and enter phone number and email address 
3. Click Save
4. Return to player profile tab 
5. Click save on player profile
custom_expected:
1. New Trainer/Agent Profile page should be opened. 
2. All fields should work appropriately
3. Trainer/Agent profile is saved. Appears on the scout clipboard with a status of preliminary 
4. Trainer/Agent information is populated in the player profile 
5. Player profile is saved

title: Submit a Preliminary Item
custom_preconds:
Log in as MLSB Scout
Preliminary International item must be located on the clipboard
custom_steps:
1. Locate preliminary item on scout clipboard 
2. Check the checkbox of item and click submit
custom_expected:
1. Item is located on clipboard 
2. Item has a status of submitted on the scout clipboard. Item appears on the scouting admin clipboard with a status of submitted

title: Delete a Preliminary Item
custom_preconds:
Log in as MLSB Scout
Preliminary item must be located on the clipboard
custom_steps:
1. Locate preliminary item on the scout clipboard 
2. Check the checkbox of preliminary item and click delete.
custom_expected:
1. Preliminary item is on clipboard 
2. Item is hard deleted from the system. No longer appears on clipboard.

title: Submit a Rejected item
custom_preconds:
Login as MLSB Scout
Rejected item must be located on the scout clipboard
custom_steps:
1. Locate rejected item on the scout clipboard 
2. Check the checkbox of the rejected item and click submit 
3. Open Item
custom_expected:
1. Item located on the scout clipboard 
2. Item now appears on the scout clipboard and the scouting admin clipboard with a status of submitted
3. Item has a player status of submitted

title: Create a Suspect Player
custom_steps:
1. Fill out required fields on create new 
2. Click Next 
3. Locate scouting status dropdown 
4. Change scouting status to International Suspect and fill in all required fields
custom_expected:
1. Fields work as expected 
2. User is brought to profile in edit mode 
3. Scouting status dropdown located in the profile header. Scouting status should be defaulted to Prospect 
4. Dropdown list should be displayed. After suspect has been selected profile should be update. There should be no "Submit" button present. Only "Save" and "Cancel" should be displayed.

title: Save Suspect profile
custom_steps: 1. Click Save button
custom_expected: 1. Profile is saved and profile loads to view mode

title: Suspect player appears red in quicksearch
custom_steps:
1. Set quicksearch to intl players 
2. Quicksearch for suspect player
custom_expected:
1. Quicksearch is set to search for intl 
2. Player name appears red in quicksearch

title: Submit a Report
custom_steps:
1. Click Submit on International player report 
2. Click home on left nav and view scout clipboard
custom_expected:
1. Notification that report was submitted appears and report loads to view mode 
2. User is returned to home dashboard and International Prospect report item appears on scout clipboard with a status of submitted

title: Approve A Submitted Report
custom_steps:
1. Locate Scouting Admin Clipboard widget
2. Locate a submitted report on clipboard and click on International Prospect report 
3. Click approve
custom_expected:
1. Scouting Admin Clipboard is visible
2. Submitted item is on clipboard. Report opens in edit mode with Approve, Reject, Save, Print, Cancel and Delete buttons present 
3. Report is approved and reloads to view mode. Falls of the scouting admin clipboard and the scout clipboard.

title: Reject a Submitted Report
custom_steps:
1.Locate Scouting Admin Clipboard widget
2.Locate a submitted report on clipboard and click on International Prospect report
3.Click reject
custom_expected:
1. Scouting Admin Clipboard is visible 
2.Submitted item is on clipboard. Report opens in edit mode with Approve, Reject, Print, Cancel and Delete buttons present
3. Report is rejected and reloads to view mode. Falls off the scouting admin clipboard BUT remains on the scout clipboard with a status of Rejected

title: Verify able to create a report with Player(s)
custom_preconds:
Login as MLSB Scout

Select Daily Report in Create New Dropdown
custom_steps:
1. Select a Date
2. Click Next
3. Enter a player into Players Section
4. Click Add Player
5. Repeat step 3 and 4
custom_expected:
1. A datepicker field should be displayed for the Scout to select which day to create the Daily Report for.
2. A blank report for the selected Calendar Day should be opened
3. All fields should work appropriately
4. A matching check for the player information is performed. If the information entered matches an existing profile.
Click Add Existing Player to add the existing profile to the Daily Report. The entered player should be added to the table below.
5. Same result as 3 and 4.

title: Verify daily report is saved
custom_steps: 1. Click Save
custom_expected: 1. A message should be displayed to confirm that the report has been successfully saved. Daily Report is accessible in Scout's Clipboard with a status of "Preliminary"

title: Verify Submitted report has a status of approved
custom_steps:
1. Open Preliminary daily report from the scout clipboard 
2. Click submit 
3. Quicksearch for player that was on the daily report 
4. Click scouting tab 
5. Open the daily report
custom_expected:
1. Daily report opens in edit mode 
2. Report is submitted, but is automatically approved so will not appear on the scout clipboard. Page reloads to dashboard.
3. Player appears in results and profile opens 
4. Scouting reports for the player displays 
5. Report opens, Record Status says Approved.

title: Verify a Suspect Profile has been created on the system
custom_preconds:
Login: MLSB Scout

Select Daily report in create new dropdown. 
Select today or past date and click next
custom_steps:
1. Enter information of a non-existing player in the player section and click add player 
2. Fill out required fields of Daily Report 
3. Click Submit 
4. Quicksearch for player 
5. Open profile
custom_expected:
1. No match message is displayed, player is entered to daily report 
2. Fields work as expected 
3. Daily report is submitted, user is returned to home dashboard
4. Player name appears red in quicksearch
5. Profile opens in view mode. Scouting status is International Suspect and the scouting information entered on the daily report is populated into the profile

title: Verify MLSB Admin has permissions to edit Daily Report
custom_preconds:
Login: MLSB Admin

Daily report has been submitted
custom_steps:
1. Locate Scouting Admin Notifications widget
2. Open Daily Report
3. Update some fields and click save  
4. Return to notifications widget and open same report
custom_expected:
1. Scouting Admin notification widget is visible
2. Daily Report opens in edit mode 
3. Field work as expected. Changes are saved 
4. Report opens in edit mode with admin changes

title: New Trainer/Agent profile loads
custom_steps:
1. Locate Trainers/Agents widget
2. Click Create New
custom_expected:
1. Trainers/Agents widget is visible
2. A blank Trainer Profile should be displayed

title: Verify preliminary Trainer/Agent profile is created
custom_steps:
1. Fill out required fields 
2. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Fields work as expected  
2. A message should be displayed to indicate that the new Trainer/Agent 
Profile has been saved successfully. Trainer/Agent is added to the Scout's Clipboard with a status of "Preliminary"

title: Verify required fields need to be filled in
custom_steps: 1. Click Submit
custom_expected: 1. A blocker message should be displayed to advise that all required fields need to be filled in.

title: Submit to MLSB Admin for Approval
custom_steps:
1. Fill in all required fields
2. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. All fields work appropriately
2. A message should be displayed to indicate that the new Trainer/Agent Profile has been submitted for approval. 
The Created By field and the Last Updated field should be auto populated. The submitted trainer/agent profile
should appear on the Admin Clipboard and on the submitting Scout's Clipboard with a status of "Submitted".

title: Approve a Trainer/Agent Submission
custom_steps:
1. Locate scouting admin clipboard 
2. Open Submitted Trainer/Agent profile 
3. Click Approve
custom_expected:
1. Widget is displayed 
2. Trainer/Agent profile opens in edit mode with Approve Reject Delete Cancel buttons on profile 
3. Notification that profile is approved. Profile loads to view mode. Item drops off scouting admin clipboard and scout clipboard

title: Reject a Trainer/Agent Submission
custom_steps:
1. Locate scouting admin clipboard
2. Open Submitted Trainer/Agent profile
3. Click Reject
custom_expected:
1. Widget is displayed
2. Trainer/Agent profile opens in edit mode with Approve Reject Delete Cancel buttons on profile
3. Notification that profile is rejected. Profile loads to view mode. Item drops off scouting admin clipboard and scout clipboard

title: Verify match message is displayed
custom_steps:
1. Enter information of mlsb approved player in create new widget 
2. Click next
custom_expected:
1. Fields work as expected 
2. Match message is displayed with Register and Register mlsb entered entered button. User has the option to register with mlsb profile or to register without using the mlsb profile

title: Use MLSB profile to register profile
custom_steps:
1. Enter information of approved mlsb player 
2. Click next 
3. Click radio button of match message 
4. Click Register MLSB Entered 
5. Fill out required fields and click register
custom_expected:
1. Fields work as expected 
2. Match message displays with Register MLSB Entered and Register buttons. Register button is active 
3. Register mlsb entered button becomes active 
4. Profile loads to edit mode. Information from scouting profile is auto-populated. 
5. Profile is registered successfully. Registration status is Pending BOC Review

title: Register without MLSB profile
custom_steps:
1. Enter information of approved mlsb player and click Register 
2. Click register on match message
3. Fill in required fields 
4. Click Register 
5. Click register on match message
custom_expected:
1. Fields work as expected and match message displays with Register mlsb entered and register buttons 
2. Profile loads to edit mode 
3. Fields work as expected 
4. Match message displays 
5. Player is successfully registered. Registration status is Pending BOC Review

title: Merge the Scouting profile with the MLSB profile
custom_steps:
1. Search for the player that you've create on the Registration Admin Widget
2. Open the expansion and click Merge 
3. Click Yes
4. Select which info will be the master and click merge 
5. Open the Player's Profile on the Registration Admin Widget
custom_expected:
1. Verify that the player shows up in the Registration Admin widget with a match expansion in the match column
2. Message appears alerting that Player's registration status will be unverified 
3. User has options as to which will be the master info 
4. Two profiles merge. Only one player appears in the reg admin widget 
5. Verify that the Reg and Scouting Info appear on the Player's profile

title: Approve an Item from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
Log in as MLSB Admin 
Items must be submitted to admin for review
custom_steps:
1. Locate submitted item on the clipboard 
2. Check the checkbox of item on the clipboard and click approve 
3. Open item (Quicksearch or advanced search for item)
custom_expected:
1. Submitted item is on the clipboard 
2. Item is approved and is removed from the scouting admin clipboard and the scout clipboard 
3. Item has a status of approved

title: Reject and item from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
Log in as MLSB Admin
Items must be submitted to admin for review
custom_steps:
1. Locate submitted item on the clipboard
2. Check the checkbox of item on the clipboard and click reject
3. Open item (Quicksearch or advanced search for item)
custom_expected:
1. Submitted item is on the clipboard
2. Item is rejected and is removed from the scouting admin clipboard and the scout clipboard
3. Item has a status of Rejected

title: Remove a submitted item from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
Login: MLSB Admin
Submitted items for admin to review
custom_steps:
1. Locate submitted item on the clipboard
2. Check the checkbox of item on the clipboard and click remove
3. Open item (Quicksearch or advanced search for item)
custom_expected:
1. Item located on scouting admin clipboard 
2. Item is removed from the clipboard 
3. Item has a status of submitted. Removing the item from the clipboard does not change the status of the item.

title: Verify MLSB Scout can save and edit approved profile
custom_preconds:
MLSB Profile must be approved my MLSB Admin 
Log in as MLSB Scout
custom_steps:
1. Quicksearch for MLSB Approved Profile
2. Click edit
3. Edit fields and click save
4. Return to home dashboard
custom_expected:
1. Player appears in results. When the player is clicked profile page should be displayed in view mode
2. Profile reloads in edit mode
3. Fields work as expected. Notification appears that profile has been saved. Edited fields appear in red and profile remains in edit mode
4. International Player Updates appears on scout clipboard with a status of Preliminary
